question1.question: Q1: A:_____ did you live in New York? B:I lived there for almost five years.

question2.question: Q2: They threw a rock _____ the window and broke the glass.

question3.question: Q3: He didn't speak English, _____ it was difficult to make him understand what he had to do.

question4.question: Q4: Why did you turn off the TV? B: Because I _____. I'm very tired.

question5.question: Q5: This is the famous wine _____ is produced in this region.
